subSubSection.paragraph:
Paratype :
1 lot, 1 specimen —NUP 6344, 1, 156.6 mm SL: Brazil , Amazonas , rio Marauiá , near the mouth, “igapó” (= flooded forest), rio Negro basin, 0°24’S , 65°12’W , M. Goulding ,
27 May 1979
.
